```{=html}
<script>
// Carousel state for each carousel
const carousels = new Map();

class Carousel {
  constructor(carouselId) {
    this.carouselId = carouselId;
    this.currentIndex = 0;
    this.carousel = document.getElementById(carouselId);
    this.carouselContainer = document.querySelector(`[data-carousel="${carouselId}"]`);
    this.items = [];
    this.totalItems = 0;
    this.isDragging = false;
    this.startPos = 0;
    this.currentTranslate = 0;
    this.prevTranslate = 0;
    this.animationId = 0;
    this.scrollTimeout = null;
    this.isScrolling = false;
    this.hasMoved = false;
    
    this.init();
  }
  
  init() {
    if (!this.carousel || !this.carouselContainer) return;
    
    this.items = this.carousel.querySelectorAll('.feature-card');
    this.totalItems = this.items.length;
    this.updateCarousel();
    
    // Add click handlers to each card
    this.items.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('click', (e) => this.handleCardClick(e));
    });
    
    // Add mouse events
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => this.dragStart(e));
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => this.dragMove(e));
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('mouseup', (e) => this.dragEnd(e));
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('mouseleave', (e) => this.dragEnd(e));
    
    // Add touch events
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => this.dragStart(e), { passive: false });
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('touchmove', (e) => this.dragMove(e), { passive: false });
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('touchend', (e) => this.dragEnd(e));
    
    // Add wheel/scroll events for trackpad
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => this.handleWheel(e), { passive: false });
    
    // Prevent context menu
    this.carouselContainer.addEventListener('contextmenu', e => e.preventDefault());
  }
  
  handleCardClick(e) {
    if (this.hasMoved) {
      e.preventDefault();
      return false;
    }
  }
  
  getItemsInView() {
    const containerWidth = this.carouselContainer.offsetWidth;
    
    // Calculate padding based on screen size
    let padding;
    if (window.innerWidth <= 480) {
      padding = 70; // 35px * 2
    } else if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
      padding = 100; // 50px * 2
    } else {
      padding = 120; // 60px * 2
    }
    
    const availableWidth = containerWidth - padding;
    
    // Calculate actual card width + gap based on screen size
    let cardWidth;
    if (window.innerWidth <= 480) {
      cardWidth = 260; // card width on very small screens
    } else if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
      cardWidth = 280; // card width on tablets
    } else {
      cardWidth = 300; // card width on desktop
    }
    
    // Calculate how many cards can fit - use a more generous calculation
    // that accounts for the fact that the last card doesn't need a gap after it
    const gap = 20;
    
    // Check if all items can fit (with a small tolerance for rounding/flexbox behavior)
    if (this.totalItems > 0) {
      const totalSpaceNeeded = (cardWidth * this.totalItems) + (gap * (this.totalItems - 1));
      const tolerance = 50; // 50px tolerance for flexible layouts
      if (availableWidth >= (totalSpaceNeeded - tolerance)) {
        return this.totalItems; // All items fit
      }
    }
    
    // Otherwise, calculate how many can fit
    const maxItems = Math.floor((availableWidth + gap) / (cardWidth + gap));
    
    // Ensure we don't return more items than actually exist
    return Math.min(maxItems, this.totalItems);
  }
  
  updateCarousel() {
    const itemsInView = this.getItemsInView();
    const maxIndex = Math.max(0, this.totalItems - itemsInView);
    
    // Ensure currentIndex is within bounds
    this.currentIndex = Math.max(0, Math.min(this.currentIndex, maxIndex));
    
    // Calculate actual card width + gap based on screen size
    let cardWidth;
    if (window.innerWidth <= 480) {
      cardWidth = 260; // card width on very small screens
    } else if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
      cardWidth = 280; // card width on tablets
    } else {
      cardWidth = 300; // card width on desktop
    }
    
    const itemWidth = cardWidth + 20; // card width + gap
    const translateX = this.currentIndex * -itemWidth;
    this.currentTranslate = translateX;
    this.prevTranslate = translateX;
    this.carousel.style.transform = `translateX(${translateX}px)`;
    
    // Update button states
    const prevBtn = this.carouselContainer.querySelector('.carousel-nav.prev');
    const nextBtn = this.carouselContainer.querySelector('.carousel-nav.next');
    
    if (prevBtn && nextBtn) {
      // Check if all items fit in the current view OR if scrolling doesn't reveal new cards
      const allItemsFit = this.totalItems <= itemsInView;
      
      if (allItemsFit) {
        // Hide buttons completely if all items fit
        prevBtn.style.display = 'none';
        nextBtn.style.display = 'none';
      } else {
        // Show buttons and manage their states
        prevBtn.style.display = 'block';
        nextBtn.style.display = 'block';
        
        // Disable prev button if at the beginning
        prevBtn.disabled = this.currentIndex === 0;
        
        // Disable next button if at the end
        nextBtn.disabled = this.currentIndex >= maxIndex;
      }
    }
  }
  
  moveCarousel(direction) {
    const itemsInView = this.getItemsInView();
    const maxIndex = Math.max(0, this.totalItems - itemsInView);
    
    // Don't move if all items fit in view
    if (this.totalItems <= itemsInView) {
      return;
    }
    
    // Calculate new index
    const newIndex = this.currentIndex + direction;
    
    // Only update if the new index is valid
    if (newIndex >= 0 && newIndex <= maxIndex) {
      this.currentIndex = newIndex;
      this.updateCarousel();
    }
  }
  
  dragStart(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    
    if (e.type === 'touchstart') {
      this.startPos = e.touches[0].clientX;
    } else {
      this.startPos = e.clientX;
    }
    
    this.isDragging = true;
    this.hasMoved = false;
    this.animationId = requestAnimationFrame(() => this.animation());
    this.carouselContainer.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
  }
  
  dragMove(e) {
    if (!this.isDragging) return;
    
    e.preventDefault();
    
    let currentPosition;
    if (e.type === 'touchmove') {
      currentPosition = e.touches[0].clientX;
    } else {
      currentPosition = e.clientX;
    }
    
    const diff = currentPosition - this.startPos;
    
    if (Math.abs(diff) > 5) {
      this.hasMoved = true;
    }
    
    this.currentTranslate = this.prevTranslate + diff;
  }
  
  dragEnd() {
    if (!this.isDragging) return;
    
    this.isDragging = false;
    cancelAnimationFrame(this.animationId);
    this.carouselContainer.style.cursor = 'grab';
    
    const movedBy = this.currentTranslate - this.prevTranslate;
    
    if (movedBy < -100 && this.currentIndex < this.totalItems - this.getItemsInView()) {
      this.currentIndex += 1;
    }
    
    if (movedBy > 100 && this.currentIndex > 0) {
      this.currentIndex -= 1;
    }
    
    this.updateCarousel();
    
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.hasMoved = false;
    }, 10);
  }
  
  handleWheel(e) {
    if (this.isScrolling) {
      // If we're already scrolling the carousel, prevent any scroll
      if (Math.abs(e.deltaX) > 0) {
        e.preventDefault();
      }
      return;
    }
    
    // Detect if this is horizontal scrolling
    // Check if deltaX exists and is significantly larger than deltaY
    const isHorizontalScroll = (Math.abs(e.deltaX) > 0 && Math.abs(e.deltaX) >= Math.abs(e.deltaY)) || e.shiftKey;
    
    if (isHorizontalScroll) {
      // Prevent the default horizontal page scroll
      e.preventDefault();
      
      const delta = e.deltaX || (e.shiftKey ? e.deltaY : 0);
      
      if (Math.abs(delta) > 30) {
        this.isScrolling = true;
        
        if (delta > 0) {
          const itemsInView = this.getItemsInView();
          const maxIndex = Math.max(0, this.totalItems - itemsInView);
          if (this.currentIndex < maxIndex) {
            this.currentIndex += 1;
            this.updateCarousel();
          }
        } else {
          if (this.currentIndex > 0) {
            this.currentIndex -= 1;
            this.updateCarousel();
          }
        }
        
        clearTimeout(this.scrollTimeout);
        this.scrollTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
          this.isScrolling = false;
        }, 300);
      }
    }
    // For vertical scrolling (deltaY > deltaX), don't preventDefault - allow normal page scroll
  }
  
  animation() {
    if (this.isDragging) {
      this.carousel.style.transform = `translateX(${this.currentTranslate}px)`;
      requestAnimationFrame(() => this.animation());
    }
  }
}

// Global function for button clicks
function moveCarousel(direction, carouselId) {
  const carousel = carousels.get(carouselId);
  if (carousel) {
    carousel.moveCarousel(direction);
  }
}

// Initialize all carousels when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const carouselElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-carousel]');
  carouselElements.forEach(element => {
    const carouselId = element.dataset.carousel;
    const carousel = new Carousel(carouselId);
    carousels.set(carouselId, carousel);
  });
});

// Update all carousels on window resize
window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
  carousels.forEach(carousel => {
    carousel.updateCarousel();
  });
});
</script>
```
